parameters.name: AnchorId
parameters.description: The ID of the streamer that was specified when you created the room.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format.

parameters.name: Order
parameters.description: The sort order based on creation time. Valid values: asc and desc. Default value: desc.

parameters.name: PageNum
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: RoomStatus
parameters.description:
The status. Valid values:

*   0: specifies that the stream is not being ingested.
*   1: specifies that the stream is being ingested.
*   2: specifies that the stream is interrupted.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format.
